job.title: .Net Engineer - Javascript/SQL/Angular - Great Team!!
job.description:
If you are a .Net Software Engineer with 5+ years of experience, please read on!
Job Title:
.Net Software Engineer
Location:
Chattanooga TN - Onsite team
Salary:
$85K - $100K
Requirements:
BS Computer Science/ Engineering/ IT with 3+ years of IT Development Experience
This would be an amazing opportunity for you if you are looking to join a growing dynamic team.
Additional ways in which a candidate may stand out would be:
Ability to work in a fast paced, team oriented development environment
Excellent troubleshooting skills
Excellent communication skills and be able to communicate technical ideas effectively
What You Will Be Doing
Delivery high quality code both individually and in a team environment
Develop new line of business and customer facing software systems
Develop enhancements and maintain line of business and customer facing software systems
Provide Teir 3 support for custom and COTS applications as issues are escalated
Mentor junior team members
Collaborate with the IT team to complete projects
Completes special projects upon requests, and other duties as assigned.
What You Need for this Position
Bachelors Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Information Technology
Microsoft certifications preferred
3+ years of IT development experience
3+ years of .Net 3.5+, C#, ASP.NET
3+ years with modern Javascript development, CSS, and HTML
3+ years with SQL and Relational Databases
3+ years with Entity Framework, LINQ, and SQL
3+ years of experience with Javascript frameworks like Angular, Aurelia, etc.
Systems development lifecycle, Scrum, Agile, etc.
Browser dev tools
IOC, DI, MVC, MVVM
Object Oriented Programming
Multi-tier database-driven systems
What's In It for You
Vacation/PTO
Medical
Dental
Vision
401k
So, if you are a Software Engineer with experience, please apply today!
Email Your Resume In Word To
Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:
Jenn.Parrella@CyberCoders.com
Please do NOT change the email subject line in any way. You must keep the JobID: linkedin : JP10-1642057 -- in the email subject line for your application to be considered.***
Jenn Parrella - Lead Recruiter - CyberCoders
Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.
CyberCoders, Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.
Your Right to Work
- In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
